ch.unibe.iam.graph
Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraph, HashGraph, MatrixGraph
public interface Graph

A graph consisting of edges and vertices. This interface defines the common API for directed and undirected graphs.

Version:
$Revision: 1.23 $ $Date: 2004/05/14 15:31:30 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
See Also:
GraphElementFactory, Vertex, Edge, GraphElement

Method Summary
 Edge addEdge(int pID, Vertex pVxHead, Vertex pVxTail)
          Adds a new edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail to this graph.
 Edge addEdge(Vertex pVxHead, Vertex pVxTail)
          Adds a new edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail to this graph.
 SequentialIdMapper addGraph(Graph pGraph)
          add a graph to the graph. ids are automatically assigned, a mapping is returned. the graphs must be either both directed or both undirected. no merging of different graph types is supported. the attributes on the graphelements are not duplicated!
 Vertex addVertex()
          Adds a new vertex to this graph.

areAdjacent

public boolean areAdjacent(Vertex pVertex1,
                           Vertex pVertex2)
Returns true if vertices pVertex1 and pVertex2 of this graph are adjacent i.e. they are joined by an edge.

Parameters:
pVertex1 - First vertex.
pVertex2 - Second vertex.
Returns:
true if vertices pVertex1 and pVertex2 of this graph are adjacent.

getEdge

public Edge getEdge(int pEdID)
Returns edge of this graph with element ID pEdID.

Parameters:
pEdID - Element ID of requested edge.
Returns:
Edge with element ID pEdID or null if not found.

getEdge

public Edge getEdge(Vertex pVxHead,
                    Vertex pVxTail)
Returns an edge of this graph originating at vertex pVxTail and ending at vertex pVxHead. If there exist several edges that connect the vertices (i.e. there exists a multi-edge), one edge will be randomly selected and returned.

Parameters:
pVxHead - Head vertex of searched edge.
pVxTail - Tail vertex of searched edge.
Returns:
Edge that has specified vertices as endpoints, or null if the specified vertices are not connected.

getEdges

public Edge[] getEdges(Vertex pVxHead,
                       Vertex pVxTail)
Returns all edges of this graph originating at vertex pVxTail and ending at vertex pVxHead.

Parameters:
pVxHead - Head vertex of searched edges.
pVxTail - Tail vertex of searched edges.
Returns:
Array of edges which have the specified vertices as endpoints, or null if the specified vertices are not connected.

addEdge

public Edge addEdge(Vertex pVxHead,
                    Vertex pVxTail)
Adds a new edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail to this graph.

Parameters:
pVxHead - Head vertex of new edge.
pVxTail - Tail vertex of new edge.
Returns:
New edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail.

addEdge

public Edge addEdge(int pID,
                    Vertex pVxHead,
                    Vertex pVxTail)
Adds a new edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail to this graph.

Parameters:
pID - ID of new edge. Has to be unique.
pVxHead - Head vertex of new edge.
pVxTail - Tail vertex of new edge.
Returns:
New edge between vertices pVxHead and pVxTail.

moveEdge

public void moveEdge(Edge pEdge,
                     Vertex pVxHead,
                     Vertex pVxTail)
Moves the edge pEdge of this graph to head vertex pVxHead and tail vertex pVxTail.

Note that no new edge will be created i.e. the ID of the edge pEdge remains unchanged.

Parameters:
pEdge - Edge to be moved.
pVxHead - New head vertex of the edge.
pVxTail - New tail vertex of the edge.

removeEdge

public void removeEdge(Edge pEdge)
Removes edge pEdge of this graph.

Parameters:
pEdge - Edge to be removed.

removeEdges

public int removeEdges(Vertex pVxHead,
                       Vertex pVxTail)
Removes all edges with head vertex pVxHead and tail vertex pVxTail of this graph.

Parameters:
pVxHead - Head vertex of edges to be removed.
pVxTail - Tail vertex of edges to be removed.
Returns:
Number of edges that were removed.

New vertex.

addVertex

public Vertex addVertex(int pID,
                        int pEstimatedDegree)
Adds a new vertex with element id pID and estimated maximum degree pEstimatedDegree to this graph.

Parameters:
pEstimatedDegree - Estimated maximum degree of new vertex.
Returns:
New vertex.

removeVertex

public void removeVertex(Vertex pVertex)
Removes vertex pVertex of this graph. Any connected edges to vertex pVertex will be removed, too.

Parameters:
pVertex - Vertex to be removed.

isolateVertex

public int isolateVertex(Vertex pVertex)
Isolates vertex pVertex in this graph. Any connected edges to vertex pVertex will be removed.

Parameters:
pVertex - Vertex to be isolated.
Returns:
Number of edges adjacent to vertex pVertex that were removed, or -1 if vertex pVertex does not belong to this graph.

Gets an array of all edges of this graph.

Array of all edges of this graph.

returns the id of the graph

String id

setId

public void setId(java.lang.String pId)
set the id of the graph

Parameters:
pId - the id to be assigned

addGraph

public SequentialIdMapper addGraph(Graph pGraph)
add a graph to the graph. ids are automatically assigned, a mapping is returned. the graphs must be either both directed or both undirected. no merging of different graph types is supported. the attributes on the graphelements are not duplicated! (the reference to the map is copied.)

Parameters:
pGraph - the graph to be added
